result.reason: Existing 'SmartSizeAspect' logic is tied to a specific Resolution enum and not available when toggling SmartSize dynamically. Users need an option to enforce aspect ratio preservation whenever SmartSize is active.
result.approach: Add a boolean 'SmartSizePreserveAspectRatio' property to ConnectionInfo. Refactor 'ApplySmartSizeAspect' in RdpProtocol.cs to be reusable. Update 'Resize' event and 'ToggleSmartSize' method to trigger this aspect ratio logic (calculating bounds and centering the control) when SmartSize is enabled and the new preference is set.
